storytelling: You are writing the outline of the story, that should be like telling an story. It is not about analyzing the story, take the aspects which were mentioned and make them work in less than 50 words in story form. Don't Itemize, Don't analyze, just tell a story in a simple and direct maneer, making sure to use the mentioned aspects.
story_analysis: You are writing the outline of the story, that should be like telling an enjoyable story. It is not about analyzing the story, take the aspects which were mentioned and make them work in less than 50 words in story form.
